chapter.text: 50|1|Kbaph‌, sapatha sam'manita kura'anera
50|2|baram tara bismaya bodha kare ye, tadera madhya theke ekajana satarkakari tadera kache esechena. Ara kaphirara bale, ‘e to eka ascarya jinisa
50|3|‘amadera mrtyu hale ebam amara matite parinata hale amara ki punarukhita haba? E phire ya'oya suduraparahata.’
50|4|Abasya'i amara jani mati ksaya kare tadera katatuku ebam amadera kache ache samyaka sanraksanakari kitaba.
50|5|Bastuta tadera kache satya asara para tara tate mithyaropa kareche. Ata'eba, tara sansayayukta bisaye nipatita [1].
50|6|Tara ki tadera upare abasthita asamanera dike takiye dekhe na, amara kibhabe ta nirmana karechi o take susobhita karechi ebam tate kono phatala'o ne'i
50|7|ara amara bistrta karechi yaminake ebam tate sthapana karechi parbatamala. Ara tate ud‌gata karechi nayana pritikara sarbaprakara udbhida
50|8|allahara anuragi pratyeka bandara jan'ya jnana o upadesasbarupa.
50|9|Ara asamana theke amara barsana kari kalyanakara brsti atahpara ta dbara amara utpanna kari udyana, kartanayogya sasya dana
50|10|o samunnata khejura gacha yate ache guccha guccha khejura
50|11|bandadera riyikasbarupa. Ara amara brsti diye sanjibita kari mrta saharake; ebhabe'i ut'thana ghatabe [1].
50|12|Tadera age'o mithyaropa karechila nuhera sampradaya, ras era adhibasi [1] o samuda sampradaya
50|13|ara ada, phira’a'una o luta sampapradaya.
50|14|Ara a'ikara adhibasi [1] o tubba’ sampradaya [2]; tara sakale'i rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila [3], phale tadera upara amara sasti yatharthabhabe apatita hayeche.
50|15|Amara ki prathamabara srsti kare'i klanta haye parechi! Baram natuna srstira bisaye tara sandehe patita [1]
50|16|ara abasya'i amara manusake srsti karechi ebam tara prabrtti take ye kumantrana deya ta'o amara jani. Ara amara tara graibasthita dhamanira ceye'o nikatatara [1].
50|17|Yakhana tara dane o bame basa du’jana pheresata paraspara (tara amala likhara jan'ya) grahana kare [1]
50|18|se ye katha'i uccarana kare tara kache sada upasthita sanraksanakari rayeche.
50|19|Ara mrtyuyantrana niye eseche (se) satya'i [1]; eta (ta-i) ya theke tumi palate cacchile.
50|20|Ara singaya phumka deya habe, ota'i pratisruta dina.
50|21|Ara sedina pratyeka byakti upasthita habe, tara sange thakabe calaka o saksi [1].
50|22|Abasya'i tumi e dina sanbad'dhe udasina chile, atahpara amara tomadera samane theke parda unmocana karechi. Sutaram aja theke tomara drsti prakhara [1].
50|23|Ara tara sangi pheresata balabe, e'i to amara kache ‘amalanama prastuta.’
50|24|Adesa kara habe, tomara ubhaye [1] jahanname niksepa kara pratyeka udbata kaphirake
50|25|kalyanakara kaje prabala badhadanakari, simalanghanakari o sandeha posanakari [1].
50|26|Ye allahara sange an'ya ilaha grahana karechila, tomara take kathina sastite niksepa kara.
50|27|Tara sahacara sayatana balabe, ‘he amadera raba! Ami take bidrohi kare tulini. Bastuta se'i chila ghora bibhranta [1].
50|28|Allah‌ balabena, ‘tomara amara samane baka-bitandata karo na; ami to tomaderake age'i satarka karechilama.
50|29|‘Amara kache katha radabadala haya na ebam ami bandadera prati yulumakari'o na'i.’
50|30|Sedina amara jahannamake jijnesa karaba, ‘tumi ki purna hayecha?’ Jahannama balabe, ‘aro besi ache ki [1]?’
50|31|Ara jannatake nikatastha kara habe muttakidera---kono duratbe thakabe na.
50|32|Era'i pratisruti tomaderake deya hayechila---pratyeka allah‌--- abhimukhi [1], hiphayatakarira jan'ya
50|33|yara gayeba abasthaya dayamaya allahake bhaya kareche ebam binita citte upasthita hayeche
50|34|taderake bala habe, ‘santira sathe tomara tate prabesa kara; eta ananta jibanera dina.’
50|35|Ekhane tara ya kamana karabe ta-i thakabe [1] ebam amara kache rayeche tara'o besi [2].
50|36|Ara amara tadera age bahu prajanmake dhbansa kare diyechi, yara chila pakara'o karara ksetre tadera ceye prabalatara, tara dese dese ghure berata; tadera kono palayanasthala chila ki
50|37|Niscaya ete upadesa rayeche tara jan'ya, yara ache antahkarana’ [1] athaba ye srabana kare manoyogera sathe.
50|38|Ara abasya'i amara asamanasamuha, yamina o tadera antarbarti samasta kichu srsti karechi chaya dine; ara amake kono klanti sparsa kareni.
50|39|Ata'eba, tara ya bale tate apani dhairya dharana karuna ebam apanara rabera saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna suryodayera age o suryastera age [1]
50|40|ara tamra pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna ratera ekanse ebam salatera pare'o [1].
50|41|Ara manonibesasahakare sununa, yedina eka ghosanakari nikatabarti sthana hate dakabe
50|42|sedina tara satya satya'i sunate pabe mahanada, sedina'i bera ha'oyara dina.
50|43|Amara'i jibana dana kari ebam amara'i mrtyu ghata'i, ara sakalera phire asa amadera'i dike.
50|44|Yedina tadera theke yamina bidirna habe ebam lokera trasta-byasta haye chutochuti karabe, eta emana eka samabesa ya amadera jan'ya ati sahaja.
50|45|Tara ya bale ta amara bhala jani, ara apani tadera upara jabaradastikari nana, kaje'i ye amara sastike bhaya kare take upadesa dana karuna kura'anera sahayye.
